root.name: Play with the Teletubbies
root.description: Reception GameFaqs gave Play with the Teletubbies only 2 out of 10, criticizing the gameplay by saying "The only way to make it better is to make the tubbies actually respond to fully pressing the analog stick one way to run, instead of just taking it as a suggestion to walk slowly", but they praised the graphics saying "They are nice, bright, and round" and the sound stating "The soundtrack is lively, and the voices are well done".
